text: The 2016 USASA National Women's Open was the 21st staging of the tournament, and the fourth under a new format that eliminates regional qualification. The finals took place from July 14 to 17 with four teams, the first time since 2006 when no Women's Open participants played in either of the active level- two leagues. The tournament was won by defending champions Olympic Club,http://forums.bigsoccer.com/threads/womens-us-open- cup.986727/page-3#post-34343929 giving the club its third USASA title in as many seasons. ==Group play== ===Schedule=== ===Standings=== {| class="wikitable" |- !Team !Pts !W !D !L !GF !GA !GD |- |Olympic Club | 9 | 3 | 0 | 0 | 12 | 2 | +10 |- |United FC | 6 | 2 | 0 | 1 | 19 | 3 | +16 |- |CO Sporting Fury | 3 | 1 | 0 | 2 | 8 | 7 | +1 |- |Mothershucker | 0 | 0 | 0 | 3 | 1 | 28 | -27 |} ==Final== ==References== 2016 Open United Category:Denver
title: 2016 National Women's Open
